episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi02/4001_1: All of you, hear my words!

That’s Lear on the screen, right? I wonder
what’s up.

We will be holding a Single Battle tournament for
Trainers who have just arrived on Pasio.
Let the Single Master Challenge Cup begin!

Finalists will be able to challenge the leader of the
team that won the first-ever PML!

Weren’t YOU the leader of the team that won the
first PML tournament?
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi02/6001_1:
We’re gonna have a real battle
with [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Let’s show them how we battle, Pikachu!
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi02/4002_1:
Hey, I thought battles on Pasio were usually
team battles!
If so, why is this tournament for Single Battles?

Well... Lear did say that it’s for Trainers who are
new to Pasio.

So maybe he wants them to give it their all in a
format they’re used to rather than force them
into teams.
I guess Lear must’ve thought this through.

I’m new to Pasio, so I’m thinking of entering.
What about you, Ash?

Let’s show everyone on Pasio how we
battle, Pikachu!

This is our chance to have a serious battle with
[Name:PlayerNickname ] on a big stage!

We’re gonna make it to the top and battle
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Oh, I’m not gonna lose, either!

Yeah! Let’s see which of us gets to
battle [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi02/4003_1: The Single Master Challenge Cup has begun!
Both Trainers can use three Pokémon!

The battle ends when either Trainer’s Pokémon are
all knocked out!
I’m Rochelle from Lilycove City in Hoenn.

I’m Ash from Pallet Town! Let’s have a
good battle!

We now begin the first battle of the
preliminary round!
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi02/4004_1:
They’re Trainers new to Pasio, so they might
become our rivals in the future...
Which means this is a great opportunity for us!

Yeah! Let’s see what they can do—and cheer
them on!
Are you ready? Let the battle begin!
Follow it up with Draco Meteor!

It’s not looking good against an opponent that’s
strong at battling in the air...
He has a Dragon-type Pokémon too!

Both Pokémon are using Dragon Dance at the
same time!
You can’t beat our speed when we’re in the air!
How about this? Use Powder Snow!

Oh? Dragonite is slowed down because of
the cold!
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi02/4005_1: Are you curious about the tournament?

Hmm... Well, you always did have a knack for
sniffing out strong opponents.
I’m interested too. Shall we go together?
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi02/4006_1:
Sirfetch’d defeats Glalie, and Banette 
defeats Sirfetch’d...
Both Trainers have one Pokémon left!

They are both Ghost-type Pokémon who have a
mysterious and tricky fighting style!

Both of them are good at battling using
Ghost-type Pokémon’s special characteristics.

It’s gonna be a long battle, because it’s hard to
land a hit...
That might not be the case. Look at Gengar!
You’re good... Let’s finish this at once, Gengar!
Banette is no longer able to battle!
Therefore the winner is Ash, from Pallet Town!
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi02/4007_1: Both Trainers have one Pokémon left!

Uh-oh, a Water-type Pokémon? Not a great
matchup against my Flareon...
But we won’t give up till the end, just like Ash!
That was a great battle, Tina!
Let’s enjoy watching the tournament together!
Alola! I’m Axel, from Hau’oli City!
I’ll show you everything I learned in Alola!
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi02/4008_1:
Seems like you don’t like long-distance attacks,
so we’re gonna keep attacking you from here!

It won’t be that easy! Dracovish, use Water Gun to
make an opening!

The opponent is tired too! I’m counting on
you, Salazzle!
Hit them with another Water Gun, Dracovish!
OK, Dracovish. Rest up for now!
It looks fast—but not as fast as Salazzle!
Pikachu! Get the first hit with Quick Attack!
Don’t let it get away! Use Electroweb!
I’m not giving up until the end! Let’s go, Tsareena!

Heh. My Tsareena is resistant to
Electric-type moves!
It’s payback time! Use Trop Kick!
You did great! We’ll take care of the rest!

Pikachu and Dracovish are at their limits, so we
have to finish it here!
Let’s show them our bond! Lucario, Mega Evolve!
Give ’em a barrage of Aura Sphere!

Reversal is an all-out attack that becomes more
powerful the less HP the user has...

So you purposely took damage from our attack to
make use of that effect?
I hate to say it, but I’ve lost.
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi02/4009_1:
Now, it’s time for the Single Master Challenge
Cup finals!
The Trainer our challenger will face is...

I made it here as promised,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi02/4010_1: I’m counting on you as always, Dracovish!
Oh! I gave [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] that Torchic!

I guess they saw I don’t like long-distance
attacks...
Dracovish, use Water Gun!
Use Water Gun again!
Whoo! Go, go, Torchic!
OK, now I’m ready!
Dragovish, use Ice Fang on the wet ground!

Incredible! They wet the ground with Water Gun
and froze it with Ice Fang!
Torchic can’t move!
Slide on the ground to get closer!
Use Fishious Rend!
Torchic can’t continue battling!
Aww, Torchic!
Now, who’s the next Pokémon?
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi02/4010_0:
Go on, Solgaleo!
I know you can do it!
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi02/4010_1:
What an impressive showing from the PML
champion team’s leader! What a matchup for
the finals!

Let’s go, Dracovish! Slide across the ground and
use Fishious Rend!
Dracovish!
What tremendous power... But we’re not done yet!
I’m counting on you, Sirfetch’d!
Dodge with Detect and attack with Fury Cutter!
Hang in there, Sirfetch’d!

It should be feeling the damage from
Dracovish’s attacks!
You can do it! We’re almost there!
Go!
Both Sirfetch’d and Solgaleo are unable to fight!
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi02/4011_1: Aww, I wanted to battle too!

The tournament is for people who have just
arrived on Pasio, so we can’t really do much.

But I’m sure we’ll get another chance sooner
or later.
Use Quick Attack, then Iron Tail!
I’m not done yet! Go for another Thunderbolt!

Our Thunderbolts are equally matched... Then how
about this!

I’m gonna show you what I’ve learned on Pasio,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Let’s go, Pikachu! Time for our sync move!

Pikachu is no longer able to battle! Therefore, the
winner is...
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi02/4012_1: Are you sad you couldn’t battle, Red?
Well... I’m sure you’ll get the chance one day!
episode_event_ch0264_00_satoshi02/4013_1:
Congratulations on the win. That was an incredible
battle, Ash.

I extend my thanks to you for promoting Pasio and
enjoying the tournament.
We still haven’t had that battle you promised me!

I’m gonna get battling as a team down pat and
win the Masters Eight Tournament!

Ash may have been victorious at this tournament
on Pasio...

But his road to becoming a Pokémon Master isn’t
over yet!
